# Introduction
A tool for automatically building a NuXMV model of structured text (ST) for PLC


The other tools we used:

[pynuXmv](https://github.com/mattyonweb/pynuxmv)

[MATIEC](https://github.com/nucleron/matiec)

[NuXMV](https://nuxmv.fbk.eu/)

# Use
## Use ST generated by LLM real-time 
* Run `main.py` to view output

* If you want to use LLM, 
please applied key on [qianfan](https://qianfan.cloud.baidu.com/), 
and then correct `class ErnieAPI` in `src/lib/utils.py`

## Use test files
* The test files are saved in `test/indir`, 
if you want to build models of them, 
please check and correct path in `main.py` and `src/lib/utils.py`
